title: Can I get this removed please?
body:
My League client keeps crashing and now I am banned from playing for two hours flat.

[picture](http://image.prntscr.com/image/fe8953618c954fed80c24a2a8d482a12.png)

My client is continuously crashing when I get into champion select or after the game starts. It frankly is getting obnoxious, and now I am unable to continue playing the game with my friends. 

It will go away eventually but I shouldn't be punished with a 2 hour ban because this horrid client continues to crash on a daily bases. -.-

replies.body:
Same, i have been logged off of 2 different matches because leauge keeps crashing during the choosing phaze. Its not our fault that leauge decides to crash during a time that is considered dodging. Please take my 2 hour wait away as well. 

I got on earlier and it happened and i only had a 15 minute ban and was like
"oh this is just a short time, i can watch a video"
And then got off after one game after the wait. Later this day i had a friend ask to play one game because that is all the time he had but during the picking phase it said that my client stopped working and then when i got back on, it said that i had a 2 hour ban, like no, i didnt dodge :[
Send help{{item:3026}}
I sent in a support ticket but it is likely by the time it gets answered the suspension will be over.
I knew you'd get a wait queue after leaving so many games. Smh

We don't remove lower priority queues that result from[ queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) or [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), because leaving still causes others a negative experience.  What I can do is try and help you resolve whatever is causing you to crash and get you back in game.  If you are crashing in champion select or when the game starts, there may be a few factors that can be adjusted to resolve it.  For your first step, get rid of any third party programs you are using that interacts with League.  Examples of this include Play.tv and Overwolf.   Secondly, if you recently updated Windows 10 then there may be an issue where the[ Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is causing the game to crash.  In this case, disable it and give it another shot.  

Troubleshoot this in a custom game to prevent further penalties.  That should get you fixed up.
I use no third party programs and I am on Windows 7. I really don't know what could be causing me to crash beyond it needing to be repaired.

Thanks for the update!  There may be other issues as well like drivers, hardware, or bad game files.  To be sure, go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a series of steps to get this resolved.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically go over some of those processes, like a clean reinstall for a fresh slate.  Let me know if you still have any issues after going through each step.

started happening to me this morning. enter a game, play about 1-2 mins, 500 ms laggs, attemps to reconnect for 2-3 mins, and it repeats like that forever. this has never happened to me before. my connection is 10/10, didn't do anything out of the ordinary since last time i played. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
